scripts.build: NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=8192 next build && next export && next-sitemap --config next-sitemap.js
scripts.deploy: next-sitemap --config next-sitemap.js && git add . && git commit -m 'release' && git push origin develop
scripts.release: next-sitemap --config next-sitemap.js && git add . && git commit -m 'release' && git push origin main
scripts.test:cache: yarn cache:mock && echo 'Mock cache test completed'
scripts.ci:test: yarn lint && yarn cache:mock && yarn build
scripts.ci:deploy:develop: yarn cache:update:moderate && yarn build && yarn deploy
scripts.ci:deploy:main: yarn cache:fetch-all && yarn build && yarn release
scripts.health:build: yarn cache:mock && yarn build && echo 'Build health check passed'
scripts.deploy:cloudflare: yarn build && npx wrangler pages deploy out --project-name tucson-japanese-language-school --commit-dirty=true
scripts.deploy:cloudflare:full: yarn cache:fetch-all && yarn build && npx wrangler pages deploy out --project-name tucson-japanese-language-school --commit-dirty=true
scripts.deploy:cloudflare:fast: yarn cache:update:frequent && yarn build && npx wrangler pages deploy out --project-name tucson-japanese-language-school --commit-dirty=true
scripts.preview:cloudflare: yarn build && npx wrangler pages deploy out --project-name tucson-japanese-language-school --branch preview --commit-dirty=true
scripts.preview:cloudflare:full: yarn cache:fetch-all && yarn build && npx wrangler pages deploy out --project-name tucson-japanese-language-school --branch preview --commit-dirty=true
scripts.preview:cloudflare:fast: yarn cache:update:frequent && yarn build && npx wrangler pages deploy out --project-name tucson-japanese-language-school --branch preview --commit-dirty=true
